descs: [OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 5 [Vibration]
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
[OnSucceedAttack] Inflict 4 [Sinking]
[OnSucceedAttack] If target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 1 [Reduction] next turn

[OnSucceedAttack] If target is in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states, inflict 1 [Reduction] next turn

passiveList.desc:
Combat Start: against all enemies, inflict 1 [AttackDown] or 1 [DefenseDown] to all enemies (# of enemies in Staggered, Low Morale, or Panic states) times. (2 times per turn)
- Effect does not stack with E.G.O Gifts with the same effect.
passiveList.name: Insomniac Night
